Udonis Haslem signed his name, then Rafer Alston and so on down the line, each man using a black Sharpie on Dwyane Wade 's keepsake. Michael Beasley was one of the last teammates to emerge from the shower, and he never noticed Dwyane Wade when he tried to hand him the boot.`` He broke his career high, Quentin Richardson said,`` so he don't want to sign it!'' Debbie Wasserman Schultz told reporters traveling with U.S. Barack Obama after a memorial service in Arizona on Wednesday. Other than the birth of my kids, this was the most incredible feeling to see... one of your closest friends just struggle to come back to you, she said. Debbie Wasserman Schultz and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand were talking to Gabrielle Giffords in her hospital room shortly after Barack Obama and his wife, Michelle, visited.
